Aelius Sejanus, histoire romaine. English
titleStmt.author: Matthieu, Pierre, 1563-1621.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Aelius Sejanus, histoire romaine.
Translated as a satire on George Villiers, Duke of Buckingham.
Identified as STC 17665 on UMI microfilm reel 1074.
Reproductions of the originals in the Newberry Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 1027 (Newberry Library copy) and at reel 1074 (British Library copy).
